title: S.I.R
description: Silas is the world famous erotic romance author known, as S.I.R.He has made the New York Times best sellers list five times in his only two short years of writing.The odd thing about Silas. He doesn't believe in love, marriage or happily ever afterâ€™s.He believes in sex and having lots of it.It's research, Right?*******Starr Allison Kendall works as a high school English Teacher.In her downtime she likes to read trashy smut novels. Her favorite author, S.I.R.After her last lover up and left her, literally at the altar, she isn't a big fan of fairy tale romances anymore.So when by chance they end up talking online, they both start to have different feelings towards love.And when she finally tells Silas how she feels.He vanishes.
author: Samantha  Knight
